original_text: And Solomon had horses brought out of Egypt, and linen yarn: the king's merchants received the linen yarn at a price.
korean_text: 솔로몬의 말들은 애굽과 구에에서 사들였으니 왕의 무역상들이 떼로 값을 정하여 산 것이며

sentences.original_text: And Solomon had horses brought out of Egypt
king's merchants received linen yarn at a price
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 상인들이 값을 치르고 아마사를 받았습니다
